Articles.Content:
I am pround to say, after a month of failures, I have finaly made a stealth fighter. With twin engines it is fast yet agile. But anyone can make a stealth(ish) fighter. What gave me the trouble is hidding the missles. There is four hidden missles (very dangerously placed). I will let you guess there placement, it is quite easy however more elaberate placements will be used later. Hope you enjoy my frustration.

http://25.media.tumblr.com/6c3d49df1e28d960270f7857e32f1260/tumblr_mu84ng2RDf1swydyxo2_1280.png

http://31.media.tumblr.com/8db9d4eb232ae3d4f0c6a52792527b08/tumblr_mu84ng2RDf1swydyxo3_1280.png

Download

http://www./?py34xmtn4oca37b
That looks nice but it would be nice to see some different angles of the craft.
Looks great! But agreed, give us some more shots!
